reviews.review_msg: Michelle is sweet, in this course there was some reading that was definitely superfluous but overall I loved the selections. Her essay topics allow you to follow your own interests in the course while her lectures give a good general base of knowledge. I would recommend taking this class if you enjoy Romantic Poetry

Quirky and cute.  Fair and maybe even easy marking.  Advantageous marking scheme. In a small class, she didn't provide full-length lectures on a regular basis; however, she encouraged discussion and was heavy on group work.  Recommended.
